The last of the thick, warm air left Ursula's sizable backside as she sighed in relief. She struggled to reach underneath herself and pull out a shriveled strip with large bulging eyes filled with pain and sorrow. She held it close to her face and smiled.

"Mmmmm, you've served me well but now you're completely rotten, inside and out with my putrid gas," she cast the wasted man aside into a pile and swam towards the entrance to her cave; "Time to find a fresher victim," she laughed heartily.

She swims out towards the nearest channel and waits, her legs pressed flat against the sandy ground; her enormous body hidden by a low cropping of rocks. She closes her eyes to concentrate on the vibrations of the sea to detect mermen. Her stomach gurgles loudly in expectation. She always enjoyed breaking in new victims; breaking them in with the nastiest of gas. A few shriveled immediately under this kind of gaseous attack, others died instantly but most, unfortunately for them, could tough it out until they could no longer.

After a few minutes, her tentacle extends, grabbing at the waist of a young merman; he bucks and struggles but it's no use against Ursula's strong suckers. She pulls him in close, his body struggling in panic as she swims back into her home.

She turns, lifting the young merman to meet her face-to-face; her deep purple skin and dark lips wrinkled with the wide smile of delight on her face. "Hello there, aren't you a handsome, young merman."

"What are you going to do to me?"

"Why me? I'm not going to do anything," her stomach rumbled loudly.

The merman looked down at her large stomach, then back at her and she laughed as she slowly pulled the young, fighting merman towards her. She turned and parted her tentacles to expose her large anus which beat furiously as his face came close and closer. PRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOBBBBPPPPPPPP!

BRRRRRUUUMMMMPPPPP!

1553321.title: Great Mouse Detective

15533211.content:
The tavern's greatest attraction was in fact, Miss Kitty Mouse, the sexiest white mouse lady that anyone had ever laid eyes upon. She had drawn in drunken, horny men with her alluring singing voice, her blue burlesque outfit and her sultry dance moves along with her two twin sister. Right now, she was behind the stage in her room, sitting in front of the mirror awaiting her next performance.

"I'll certainly knock them dead." She murmured to herself, until she heard a familiar rumble inside of her stomach. She knew that noise all too well. "That is unless that aged wine and cheese I had won't beat me to it."

She giggled to herself at the thought. For the longest of time, what everyone (thankfully) didn't know about Miss Kitty Mouse was that she was shamelessly prone to flatulence. Each meal she had would give an unlimited source on non-stop gas that made her into an unladylike fart factory. But apart from her secret tomboyishness, she regularly took pills to keep her gas subsided temporarily, long enough for her to perform on stage. Usually it was meat and beans, and sometimes beans and meat. Any deviation often went horribly wrong, but he tended to make the family eat it anyway, partly to 'toughen them up', and partly because he didn't want to waste money. These nightly meals, if you could call them that, then combined with the cheap coffee Stan supplied the Mystery Shack that was more mud then drink, but which Wendy drank to keep herself awake on her boring shifts, as Stan was liable to dock her pay if she fell asleep on the job. Way too easy "Bill, I'm not an idiot like that guy" she said as Dipper's muffled cries resonated around the cabin "What's the catch" she didn't fully trust her new partner "NO CATCH, NO TRICK AT ALL REDHEAD. YOU SEE, I GREW TIRED OF TRYING TO CONQUER THIS WORLD, SO I FOUND NEW ONES WAY MORE AMUSING. BUT BILL NEVER FORGETS LADY, BECAUSE I WOULD BE RULING THIS PLACE IF THAT LITTLE FOOL YOU ARE NOW TORTURING HAD NOT STOPPED ME COUNTLESS TIMES. SO I WOULD LOVE TO MAKE HIS LIFE AS MISERABLE AS I CAN" he explained, anger building up in his voice. For Wendy, this was enough "Five minutes ago, i thought u were nothing but a soulless demon, but I'm starting to like you" she smiled evilly "I'M NOT THE ONLY WITHOUT SOUL HERE MY 'REDHEAD' FRIEND. DID YOU SEE THE COLOR OF YOUR HAIR?" both laughed as they shook hands, a cold shiver running across Dipper's spine as he was forced to inhale another fart.

"PREPARE YOURSELF MY FRIEND. BECAUSE THIS IS MY PRESENT FOR YOU" Bill announced snapping his fingers "YOU...
155332222222221121121111.title: Evil Friendship

choices: She makes herself grow into a giantess
She transforms him into a cushion
1553322222222211211211111.content:
...CAN NOW ENTER HIS DREAMS. MAKE SURE CAN NEVER REST AGAIN" he said “Ok, so how do I do it?” Wendy asked “WELL, THE FIRST THING YOU NEED IS TO KNOCK HIM OUT, OBVIOUSLY. THEN, A MARK WILL APPEAR ON HIS FOREHEAD. TOUCH IT, AND YOU WILL BE IN” he explained “AND REMEMBER, YOU CAN DO ANYTHING, YOU JUST HAVE TO IMAGINE IT. HAVE FUN” and with that, he disappeared. Wendy smiled evilly and looked back to her clones “Well girls, bring him to the couch so the real fun can begin” The Wendys got up, and immediately Dipper was lifted from the ground and dropped onto the couch, just to have his head pinned under the original Wendy’s ass the moment he landed on the cushions.

“Make yourselves comfortable, we have to leave him unconscious so I can try my new powers” she commanded “Sure boss!” they happily replied. Dipper couldn’t see anything under Wendy’s backside, only the clones’ legs as they stood in front of the couch, and jumped...

SLAM

He felt the first ass slam into his chest, followed by his stomach and his legs. “We have a problem boss. There is 16 of us, but this boy is so small that with just 4 we already covered all his body” one clone pointed. Wendy just smiled “Sit on our laps then” she said. The replicas laughed and did us commanded, so Dipper went from being pinned down to utterly crushed under so much weight. His head was being squished like a grape under four Wendys, and the original didn’t hesitate to fart when she felt like “Gotta speed things up, you know” she simply said. It didn’t take long for Dipper to have his vision blurry. He tried to squirm to keep himself awake, but the sweat, the smell, and the lack of air quickly took a toll on him, and he drifted into sleep. Finally, after only five minutes of nonstop crushing, she felt his body go limp, and ordered her clones to get up. In his forehead, she saw a white pentagram, so she eagerly touched it, and got absorbed by it.


She arrived on Dipper’s room in the Mistery Shack, where Dipper was sleeping, unaware of Wendy’s presence. “Well, well, Dipper. Until now, you evaded me when I knocked you out, but no more of that.”
1553322222222211211211111.title: Sweet dreams

15533222222222112112111111.content:
“NOOOOOOOO” Dipper screamed, waking up immediately. He incorporated, checked his surroundings, his face pale as the moon, and sighed relieved. Of course he was in his room! That was just a nightmare! “But boy, what a nightmare” he thought “I’m never gonna look at Wendy with the same eyes” he said, throwing his blanket away. He noticed he had his clothes on instead of his pajama, but that didn’t bother him at the moment. The room was near pitch black, so, groping the wall, he searched for the switch to turn on the lights, but when he flipped it, nothing happened. Still dark. He was still sweating and trembling when he found his way to the window and pulled the curtains open, but was taken aback by what he saw. He rubbed his eyes, as all he could see was plain white. Snow? Fog?

“AHHHHHHH” he screamed, when a black dot suddenly appeared in front of him. It was a giant eyeball!

“Finally awake dude? Man, you took your time” Wendy’s voice boomed around him. A strong tremor shocked the house, and with a simple cracking noise he saw the ceiling being ripped apart. Adrenaline kicked in as he sprinted for the door, rushing across the house to get to the exit. Maybe if she didn’t see him get out he might have a chance to run away and hide in the forest. With this in mind he dashed across the house, ramming against the door, and ran between her feet without her noticing. Partially blinded by the sun, he looked back to see that the giant Wendy, in nothing but bra and her thong, had stuck her head in the now roofless bedroom. “If you don’t hide I might go easy on you” he heard her say. Yeah right. Unfortunately, he was so focused on the colossus behind him that he didn’t notice a shadow appearing in front of him.

BOOOOOOOOOOOM

And earthquake shook the trees as Dipper slammed head first into a soft white wall. He looked up to see he was in between someone’s toes. Another giant Wendy.
“Sup dude” she casually said, grasping Dipper’s head with her toes before he realized was going on. The frail boy tried punching them away, but she just stepped forward, pinning all his body but his face under her, squashing the air out of him. “He is here” she said to her copy “You can get rid of the house” she said. Dipper looked up to see the first Wendy turn around and drop ass first on the Shack

BOOOOOOOOOOOOOM

That’s all it took for his home to be destroyed. “WHAT HAVE YOU DONE” he screamed. “Jeez, relax dude, it’s not that big of a deal. Look” He watched, mouth agape, as the clone lifted herself from the ground and the Mystery Shack started to rebuild itself in seconds. “But, how…”

“You don’t get it, don’t you?” the giant Wendy pinning him asked. “None of this is real. You are dreaming” she told him. Dipper didn’t know what to say. It was all a nightmare? So all that happened in the cabin was surely a dream too” he thought. “Nah dude, I’m sorry. Well, actually I’m not” she said laughing. “How did you…” he started “. know what you were thinking?” she finished “Don’t get it wrong little boy, what happened in the cabin was VERY real. In fact, you are still there. Look” she pointed to a small portal that appeared on her command in the air where the real world was projected. “You are under there” Dipper went pale. He saw a bunch of Wendy’s piled up on a couch, it’s legs bended to the extreme, and in the middle of them, an arm was sticking out, hanging above the floor. It was “You” she said “Yeah dude, it’s you. It was pretty easy knocking you out when you’re such a wimp” she mocked, leaning some weight on her foot to emphasize her point. He tried to scream, but his mouth was full “How you like the taste of my thongs. Fresh outta my ass, just for you! HAHAHAHAHAHA” she laughed. What was happening? He should be able to change his dream once he realized he was in one. “Not a chance dude” she said. “When you passed out you freed yourself from my control, and that’s not acceptable. So Bill made me another favor” she grinned “I can control your dreams Dipper” she said “I can read your mind” her clone continued “I own you” another clone said, appearing between the trees. Around him, hundreds of giant clones came out of the woods, each one further asserting her dominance.

“You are mine”

“You are my servant”

“Your life is over”

“You will never escape me”

“You are my slave”

“I’m your Goddess”
15533222222222112112111111.title: No escape from Wendy

choices: Wendy absorbs Bill's powers. The world is hers now.
155332222222221121121111111.content:
Dipper was panicking. There must be a way out this, it always has been that way. The giantess holding him down lifted her feet, just to butt drop on him, squashing him immediately under her ass “And this is going to be your life from now on” she ended, before unleashing a huge fart, followed by her clones, with the strong wind blowing away the Mystery Shack and the tress. The floor under him disappeared, being replaced by an infinite white mattress “At least one of us has to be comfortable” she justified. For hours, Dipper was crushed, grinded and farted on by every single Wendy. When one got up, another jumped in to take her place. Some stomped him for fun, others spat on him, others squashed him between their tights. But all ended unleashing a never ending torrent of gas. This continued for days, and by the end of it, when the final clone got up, Dipper was a whimpering mess.

“Who am I” Wendy asked. Dipper, curled on the floor, didn’t answer, so vines came off the ground, tangling around his body and lifting him to a clone awaiting asscrack, that wasted no time in letting an especially putrid fart explode on his body. “I’ll ask one last time. If you don’t answer, you will spend an entire year in my ass before I ask again. Who. Am. I” she asked. “Wendy” he babbled. “Wrong answer” she said, another clone slamming her ass into the first, entombing him between their behinds, and unleashing another barrage of farts, this time of a few minutes. “Who am I. Last chance” she sentenced. “My goddess” he barely answered. His whole body was shaking and he wanted to pass out, but he couldn’t. He was already unconscious in the real world. “Good, you are starting to accept your place. However, I had to ask you 3 times, so you still some learning, but I’m merciful. As atonement for your sins, you will lick our asses” all the clones cheered hearing this, and they laid down on the floor in line. An infinite line that was lost in the horizon. But Dipper had lost his will to fight, so he just accepted his fate, and when he was dropped in the first buttcrack, he started lapping the sweat away without questioning, as days of continued torture had shattered his mind. Maybe if he wasn’t fed for a few days…

“Don’t be silly Dipper, a merciful goddess like me would never let you starve to death” the Wendy he was cleaning pointed, reading his mind again. “In fact, it’s only been a couple of minutes!” she cheerfully said. Dipper stopped licking for a moment, with the realization of what Wendy just had said. “That’s right dude. I control the time here. One day here is like, 4 or 5 minutes in the real world” she explained. "And I can extend them even more. Talking of extending, you stopped licking there…” she said smirking “So let’s extend your punishment a bit more!” and with that, all the Wendys grew, almost doubling their sizes. “RESUME” they all commanded at the same time, the sheer force of her voice bringing him to his knees. He continued for a while, jumping from asscheek to asscheek, each moment he stopped to rest a little getting nuked by farts from all directions. After a full week, he finally reached the last one. Moving by reflexes and pure muscle memory, he cleaned every single inch of her colossal ass before collapsing face first into her cheek. “Who am I” she asked. “My goddess” he mumbled immediately, and the second he said it another Wendy slammed her butt on her companion, grinding it all over him “Good boy Dipper. You are learning where you belong” she smiled, blasting another one. Before she continued, a flashing light blinded her, as Bill manifested himself through a portal.

“HELLO MY REDHEAD FRIEND” he greeted her “Sup Bill. I didn’t know you could come inside Dipper’s mind” she commented, letting another one rip “WELL, TECHNICALLY IS VERY HARD FOR ME TO DO IT, SO I USUALLY HAVE TO MAKE A DEAL. BUT HIS MIND, WELL, YOU DEALT QUITE A LOT OF DAMAGE TO IT…” he said. “Oh, I’m just toying with him” she said smiling, playfully slapping him. She was expecting her hand to go through Bill, but she sent him crashing to the floor at high speed. “What? How did I do that?” she asked, standing and bending over to see if her friend was alright. Luckily for Bill, the soft mattress cushioned his fall. “YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL MY FRIEND” he reprimanded her. “AS I WAS EXPLAINING, I CAN ENTER HIS MIND BECAUSE OF HIS WEAKENED STATE, BUT ONLY IF YOU LET ME IN” he said pointing the portal. On the other side, Wendy #2 waved back as she and her comrades were taking turns to refuel gas. As he said that, the portal closed.

“Now that’s funny, so you can only enter if I say so” Wendy said smirking “But I thought you were like a ghost or something “Bill was quick to answer “WELL, SINCE I DIDN’T MAKE A DEAL I’M STILL I’M MY PHYSICAL BODY, SO BE CAREFUL. NOW NOW, I JUST WANTED TO CHECK ON MY FRIEND PINE TREE, BUT I SHOULD GO. CAN YOU OPEN THE PORTAL FOR ME?” he said, not realizing the big mistake he just made. “You mean you can get hurt if I’m not careful?” “YES YES, AND YOU BETTER BE, BECAUSE THAT BOY IS IMMORTAL HERE BECAUSE IT’S HIS MIND, BUT OTHERS ARE NOT” he said, regretting it at the moment he saw Wendy’s lips twisting into a wicked smile. Before he could react, more vines appeared and wrapped his body, lifting him into the air like Dipper before him “You know you are the only thing that could make Dipper go free, right dude?” she coldly asked “I WOULD NEVER DO THAT FRIEND. DON’T BE STUPID” he pleaded, but Wendy already made her mind “I can’t trust you, and I would never be your friend. Man, for a demon you are quite dumb” Bill, of all beings in the universe, wasn’t expecting this, Of course Wendy was so cruel, it was because of their deal. Before that, she was going just to torture him for a while and then let him go, but the moment they shook hands, he had planted an evil seed in her mind to push her to destroy Dipper, but clearly she went out of control. How could he not see this coming? “I NEED TO GET OUT OF HERE” he thought, freaking out when four massive clones surrounded him, bending over to engulf him in their asses “PLEASE, I’LL GIVE YOU ANYTHING. MONEY, POWER, AN ENTIRE GALAXY, INFINIT…”

SLAM

Before he could go on, the clones slammed her asses on him, squashing him to oblivion, and to make sure he was gone for sure, the released one wave of gas after another, until an explosion of light came out. Wendy smiled, as the only thing that could stop her was gone.
155332222222221121121111111.title: Infinite Torture

choices: Promise made: Dipper fights back; Dippers vs Wendys, Fart War!
Promise made: Nephilim Dipper and Cambion Wendy; Make gassy love not gassy war!
1553322222222211211211111111.content:
Out in the real world, everything stopped, and nothing moved. Nothing except the buried Dipper and Wendy's doing the burying, who were all still breathing.

But in the Mindscape, Wendy, the original, was laughing as she was enveloped in yellow light, her clones whooping and guffawing as she absorbed Bill's powers. Her muscles became more defined, her nails became as black as night, and her eyes turned black with yellow dots.

"Oh yeah!" She cried. "Now I AM a goddess!" She laughed maniacally, completely wrapped up in her euphoria, and just as unaware of Dipper.

Speaking of whom, the youngest Pines was currently hiding under a bush, having long since managed to eek his way out of the butt sandwich he was a part of in all the chaos. He had never been so glad to have Bill appear in his mind in all the time he knew him, and was equally glad he wasn't alive to find out that thought.

But he wasn't glad for long, as the reality of the situation finally hit him: he was trapped, Wendy had absorbed Bill's powers, and had the ability to trap and gas him for all eternity now. In fact it was only a matter of time before the nirvana wore off and she decided to test out these new powers on him in the best way they knew how: farting.

Now, Dipper was not a prideful boy, but he figured himself quite the gasshole himself - farting was also something Mabel never beat him at. And if there's anything this summer has taught him, it was that revenge is underrated, especially when the tools to get it were so close and yet so far. If only there was some way to even the playing field, both here and in reality.

And it was then that he realized that the laughing and whooping had stopped. Curious at this, and the fact that he wasn't taken yet, he cautiously peeked out from the bush. Only to see everything frozen, just like - unknown to him - in reality.

"Hello." Said a voice making Dipper almost jump out of his hiding spot from shock, and quickly turn to see the culprit. And found a one eyed purple square in a bowler hat for his trouble. "Hi," he said, "I'm the Anti-Bill."

When Dipper merely responded with a confused and bewildered look, he said, "You know, reverse universe, opposite of another person, multiverse stuff."

"Yeah, yeah, I get that, I'm a fan of Sci-Fi." Dipper said waving his hand. "But why and how are you here?"

"Oh, well, when my opposite died, I was free to come here." Anti-Bill replied.

"Really?" Dipper asked.

"Opposite universe, opposite rules." Anti-Bill said. "He's a demon, I'm an angel. He has difficulty entering minds without some deal or incantation on the dreamers part, and can't do anything to the physical world without possessing others or gaining a 3D form. I don't have such difficulty or restrictions in entering minds, and can manipulate the physical world in small ways. He makes deals, I make promises; he curses, I bless; he manipulates, I motivate. Easy and simple."

"Okay," Dipper said nodding, "but ' ' 'why' ' ' are you here?"

"Well, I've been watching your little situation," Anti-Bill began, "and since Bill is gone, I decided now was the time to help." He points to the frozen Wendys. "Unlike Bill, I'm in favor with Time Baby, and we've pulled strings to make what's going to happen possible."

"Make what possible?" Dipper asked.

"Leveling the playing field between you two." Anti-Bill said making Dippers eyes go wide shock.

"What?" He shouted.

"You heard me." Anti-Bill replied. "I'm going to make a promise to you: to give you the power to match her and fight back." He held out his hand and an orange orb of water appeared above it. "What she can do now, and eventually, you'll be able to do too."

Dipper stared at the glowing water in awe and shock. He couldn't believe it, it was too good to be true.

"What's the catch?" He asked folding his arms.

"The two of you will match each other, you'll only ever have as much power as she does, never more." Anti-Bill said. "Beating her is all up to you; she has clones, you have clones, she has massive rear, you have a massive rear; she blast you through a mountain, you can do so right back. Winning means outsmarting her, not outfighting her. Victory is not certain."

Dipper uncrossed his arms and looked at the orb of liquid, looking back at the frozen Wendys for a moment, and...
1553322222222211211211111111.title: Wendy absorbs Bill's powers. The world is h...

choices: Dipper wins, or they reach a stalemate
15533222222222112112111111111.content:
Dipper blood was boiling. If there was a chance to stop Wendy, he had to take it. “Anti-Bill, let’s do this” he said, grasping the orange orb. A warm sensation enveloped him, as his stomach started to rumble. “However, if you need an extra help, you can summon me. After all, she has the field advantage” With a flashing light, he was transported to an open field, surrounded by copies of himself “Let’s do this boss!” they cheered, as an army appeared in front of them; an army he knew too damn well.

“Allright dude, you are resilient, I’ll give that to you” a larger Wendy said, clearly the original. “But if you surrender now and give up your powers, I’ll be merciful” she offered. “I will only torture you for a couple hundred years” she thought. Dipper only had one response for her offering.

“CHARGE”

The Pine army rushed into the field, their guts brewing their strongest weapon. Wendy, on the other hand, stood her ground, confident on her superiority.
15533222222222112112111111111.title: Fart War

choices: Wendy stomps Anti-Bill and absorbs his powers
Anti-Bill escapes, and makes Dipper able to fight back
155332222222221121121111111111.content:
In front of them, the Wendy army stood confident, not even bothering to assume a defensive position. Dipper sensed something was not right, but before they could reach their enemies, they felt the ground shake as the terrain turned into quicksand, sinking his army until only their heads were visible. As soon as that happened, it hardened again, immobilizing them. “Of course she was going to play dirty!” he thought. He was so focused on revenge he didn’t realize what Anti-Bill said. She had the field advantage! They were still on his dream, the one she was controlling!

“Dippeeeeeeeeeeeer” a hundred voices echoed in a singsong tone. “My poor little boy” the leader said as she approached him “For a second I was actually scared” she admitted, turning around, and so did her army, each one picking a Dipper soldier, who were terrified. How could they have lost so quickly? “Boss…” He looked at his right, to one soldier that was pale as the moon “You gotta help us boss. Please let’s get out of here. Please BoMPPHHHHH” he was rapidly silenced by a Wendy, who sat on him, her asscrack devouring his face. All around her companions did the same, and soon the only thing that could be heard were his comrades muffled pleas for help “Then I remembered. I’m your Goddess, I will always be over you. Let this be a REMINDER OF THAT” she screamed, as she engulfed his face with her behind.

“Who am I” all the Wendys roared, farting at unison. They lifted their asses and all the Dippers responded “My goddess!”. All but the original, who had one last card to play “Anti-Bill, help me!” he called, and with a poof of smoke, his angel appeared beside him, wrapped in bubbles and with a shower cap “Can’t even relax, can’t I? It’s only been five minutes and you already OH MY GOD” he started but didn’t finish as he doubled in pain just by the odor in the atmosphere. “But how can you smell it? Aren’t you a ghost like Bill?” Wendy’s black eyes sparkled with excitement, the only obstacle between her and her prey right below her, close to her feet. But she didn’t move, they weren’t even noticing her! They were so absorbed in their talk they paid no attention to her. “It’s not so easy! I don’t need permission like Bill, but the drawback is that I’m always in my physical form. And being a physical being means I have senses, and boy that can be painful sometimes” he said coughing. “But you need to help me!” Dipper asked when he realized all the Wendys were looking at him “Wait, why did you not stop the time?” he asked. “I can’t. That was the Time Baby’s doing when he helped me enter” he explained, barely able to stand "But that means that Wendy is actually…” he said “…listening to you? Yeah dude, I heard everything” she admitted, smiling “But first, let’s get rid of your friend. After all, this is just between you and me” she said, lifting her feet. “DO SOMETHING QUICK” Dipper screamed as Anti-Bill struggled to move.
155332222222221121121111111111.title: Crushing Defeat

choices: Follow Wendy as she begins with the Mystery Shack
Skip one month later: Humanity is doomed
1553322222222211211211111111111.content:
Anti-Bill didn’t even have time to regret coming to this universe, before he was stomped into the ground. All surrounding Wendys soon joined the trampling, and Dipper could only look in horror as his last hope was pummeled to oblivion. To be fair, Anti-Bill lasted more than his evil counterpart, as the stomping kept going for minutes before a familiar explosion of light blinded everyone. When Dipper regained his sight, he saw what he feared the worst. In front of him, Wendy had regained her original form: her eyes white and black, her skin as smooth as ever; but she was laughing maniacally. “THIS IS IT” she screamed into the sky “NO MORE OBSTACLES” her voice boomed “NO ONE TO STAND ON MY WAY”

Dipper felt his body elevating, the earth around him letting him free as he rose into the air. Around him, both his army and Wendy’s disappeared, one by one, in a puff of smoke, and at the same Wendy grew until he was barely as big as her hand. “And all thanks to you, Dipper” she said as he stopped in front of her eyes. “If you had listened to me and submitted, we would still be in the cabin. Who knows, maybe I would have already grown bored of you and we would continue with our normal lives. But you had to be the brave hero, didn’t you? You had to resist me, to push me to my limits; until I called Bill, and doomed everyone” she said. Dipper gasped “Yes dude, I know what Bill did to me. I know I’m evil incarnate because of him… and I love it! I love being evil Dipper! The feeling of dominating another one; to break him into nothing, is incredible! I never felt such power in my life. But I want more Dipper, and thanks to you, I can go even further” she said grinning. Dipper felt an unknown force pull him downwards, until he was in front of her crotch. Turning around, Wendy pulled her thong apart, and Dipper was launched face first between her cheeks, that closed on him as soon as he landed. “But first, is time to wake you up” her ass roared as a torrent of gas hit him straight in his face, knocking him out.

Wendy woke up Dipper in the real world by the only means she knew: farting on his face. “Wakey wakey” she said, grinding her ass. Dipper woke up to the feeling of her sweaty ass slathering his face. “There is so much to do Dipper. And yet so little time. But first things first, let’s get our troops ready”

“Troops?” Dipper thought. Getting up, Wendy dragged Dipper outside, there her clones were waiting. The sunlight blinded him and he was surprised with the smell outside, as he almost had forgot it. It was so nice, the cool breeze of a summer evening caressing his face as he sniffed the fragrance of nature. Sadly, it wasn’t going to last long. With a snap of Wendy’s fingers, her clone army multiplied until she was everywhere. Dozens… no, hundreds of clones appeared with a puff of smoke, and with another snap, they all started to grow. Dipper got dizzy as he skyrocketed in the air, pulled by Wendy’s grip, and stopped in front of her eyes. “Look around Dipper, this is all thanks to you” she said, spinning to show him around. Everything he could see were giant redheads, in nothing but underwear, smiling back at him. He was suddenly pulled behind her, and what he saw below was a familiar sight: Wendy’s finger pulling back her thong, with her hungry asscrack waiting. “And you get a front row seat!” with that she released him. Around him all the clones laughed at him as he fell screaming, disappearing out of sight into the abyss. Wendy let her waistband go, feeling her tiny prisoner squirming between her cheeks. “I would love to play with you, but we… have a world to conquer!” Everyone hailed as her giant army marched into the nearest city, her glutes movement mashing him as he struggled to breath.
1553322222222211211211111111111.title: A Goddess is Born

15533222222222112112111111111112.content:
A month later

True to her word, Wendy kept Dipper inside her ass for the full month, making him immortal so, small nuisances (al least to her) like “eating” or “sleeping” could not keep him away from what she believed was a fair punishment for his sins. There was nothing the USA government could do to stop them. Wendy’s army marched all over the country, crushing all the opposition they could find. And they had no hope to be fair, as Wendy was just playing. She was omnipotent, an unstoppable goddess that could do everything she wanted just with a thought. The first thing she did was taking over the White House where the leaders of the country were sheltered, an easy task to her. The moment she approached the building almost every fighter jet available in the army bombarded her, the bombs that could erase small villages barely tickling her skin, with foot soldiers and tanks aiming for her legs. Her army responded by farting, creating such strong currents hot of air the planes were knocked out of the skies, and just trampling and butt crushing the ground forces. When they saw their demise coming, the government cabinet, president ahead, tried to escape via an underground tunnel, but the hatch was stuck; they rushed to the doors, but they were all locked. Little did they know, that it was Wendy’s doing, as with just a thought she had shut down every single exit. They panicked as her giant fingers cracked inside, lifting roof effortlessly, throwing it away before turning around, and sitting on the trembling building that could barely sustain her weight. Her ass replaced the ceiling as the president screamed to her, trying to negotiate their surrender, but there was nothing to bargain; she wanted to destroy them for fun. With a single, yet nuclear fart, everyone below her ass was disintegrated; well, not everyone. Dipper, being immortal, was not so lucky.

After erasing the mandataries of the country, Wendy’s army spread around over the territory, conquering everything with no opposition. Even more, Wendy selected a few fortunate girls, like Pacifica and her friend Tambry, and made them her duchesses, planting in them the same evil seed that started everything, and granting them powers to control the population, like growing and multiplying. Around the globe, nations fell one after another, with a few remnants of humanity hidden in shelters, not aware that she was omniscient, seeing exactly where they were hiding, waiting for them to have hope only to send her army afterwards, with some punishments in her mind for not accepting their goddess. The rest of the population was enslaved, with her massive army farting so much the air turned thicker, as her gas corrupted the atmosphere, green clouds barely letting the sun be seen as her stench flowed with the wind. Humanity was her toy to deal with it a she pleased.

Meanwhile, she came to the conclusion that, as a goddess, she needed a seat from where to reign her subjects, so she transformed mount Rushmore into a giant stone throne. In the seat she made appear a giant cushion, big enough to rest her colossal ass on, but she felt something missing. Of course! 1553322222222222222222111.content:
You, as a servant of the prince, spent almost everyday mending to his every whim. One day, you were down in the lower levels of the castle. Scrubbing, dusting, etc, when suddenly you hear a voice. "You really shouldn't work in the dark, you know". The sudden noise startled you, and you jumped, turning around. And there, lighting the candles around the room, was lovely Belle, looking as beautiful as ever. Belle laughs a little and says "I'm sorry! I hope I didn't frighten you too bad. Are you alright?" You chuckle, as you rub your head, considering you hit your head on a pipe above you. "I'm alright. If I had to get scared, at least it was from someone as beautiful as you." Belle blushes "Aww, your so sweet." "So what brings you down here?" You ask, questioningly. Belle begins to look embarrassed, "well, see I've been having these stomach problems, and, I wanted to know if...I could...you know..". You were shell shocked, as you always fantasized about Belle farting on you. You loved the roundness of her ass (which people rarely saw, due to the fact she always wore dresses.) But when you did get to see her ass, you almost wanted to drool. You couldn't believe this was actually happening. "..fart.. on you..?" Belle finished, red as a tomato. Star Butterfly had been living with the Diaz family for a few months now, and she has been loving her time with them, especially her time with Marco. He had been her best friend since coming to Earth, she'd go so far as to say he's her best friend ever (Sorry Pony Head). But even best friends like her and Marco had certain boundaries, and one of the biggest ones for them was each other's bodily functions, mainly due to how obsessive Star gets with them. Since her first day on Earth, the princess has had a weird interest in bathrooms, so it's easy to see how she'd grow an interest in passing gas and the like. However, the gas between them had always come from Marco's side. In fact, Star hasn't used a toilet correctly once since coming to live with the Diaz family, or passed gas for that matter. This made Marco begin to wonder...

"Hey Star, do people on Mewni, y'know, fart?" Marco asked, sitting on the foot of Star's bed while she read through her spell book. "Fart? Is that what you call that cute little butt noise you make?" Star asked, still not well-versed in Earth sayings. "Eh... uh, yeah." Marco blushed. "Of course we do!" Star laughed, shutting her book and looking up at Marco. "Just not often. We do it in large bursts every couple months. It usually sounds like this." She began, before blowing a raspberry in the boy's face. "Couple months? You don't have to do it anytime soon, do you?" He asked, standing up off her bed, beginning to regret getting onto this subject. "Hmm, well I cleared myself before coming here, and that was... a couple... months ago." She laughed nervously, her gut beginning to rumble. "I'll be right back. I gotta go to the bathroom for reasons unrelated to what we were just talking about." Star bolted out of her room and nearly ran straight through the bathroom door.

Marco poked his head into the hallway and saw that not only did Star leave the bathroom door open, she also had no idea how to actually use the toilet. "Marco! HELP!" He sighed and walked into the bathroom. "Yes, Star?" He asked. "The toilet! How do I use it?" She looked like she was about to burst if she didn't get to use this toilet quickly. "Uh... Star, I'm not sure if I'm comfortable explaining thi-" Marco began before Star covered his mouth with her hand. "Marco! This is important, you can either teach me how to use the toilet, or I'll have to do it in your room."

"What?! Why my room?" Marco questioned, not understanding her thought process. "I see you do it in there! I should be allowed to as well!"
